TestCase.name: testPrimitiveEquals
TestCase.Resource: SELECT empno = age FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testPrimitiveEqualsNotNull
TestCase.Resource: SELECT empno = empid FROM SALES.EMPS
return ID$0$EMPNO == ID$1$EMPID;

TestCase.name: testPrimitiveLess
TestCase.Resource: SELECT empno < age FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testPrimitiveGreater
TestCase.Resource: SELECT empno > age FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testPrimitivePlus
TestCase.Resource: SELECT empno + age FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testPrimitiveMinus
TestCase.Resource: SELECT empno - age FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testPrimitiveTimes
TestCase.Resource: SELECT empno * age FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testPrimitiveDivide
TestCase.Resource: SELECT empno / age FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testPrimitivePrefixMinus
TestCase.Resource: SELECT -age FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testPrimitiveGreaterBoolean
TestCase.Resource: SELECT manager > slacker FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testPrefixMinusCastNullTinyint
TestCase.Resource: SELECT -cast(null as tinyint) FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testPlusCastNullSmallint
TestCase.Resource: SELECT cast(null as tinyint) + cast (null as smallint) FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testVarcharEquals
TestCase.Resource: SELECT name = city FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testVarcharLess
TestCase.Resource: SELECT name < city FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testBooleanNot
TestCase.Resource: SELECT not slacker FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testBooleanOr
TestCase.Resource: SELECT slacker or manager FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testBooleanOrNullable
TestCase.Resource: SELECT (empno < age) or (name = city) FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testBooleanAnd
TestCase.Resource: SELECT slacker and manager FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testBooleanConjunction
TestCase.Resource: SELECT (empno < age) and (name = city) FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testBooleanConjunctionNotNull
TestCase.Resource: SELECT (empno = empid) and (empno = deptno) FROM SALES.EMPS
return ID$0$EMPNO == ID$2$EMPID && ID$0$EMPNO == ID$1$DEPTNO;

TestCase.name: testNullableIsTrue
TestCase.Resource: SELECT slacker is true FROM SALES.EMPS
return !ID$0$SLACKER.isNull() && ID$0$SLACKER.value;

TestCase.name: testNullableIsFalse
TestCase.Resource: SELECT slacker is false FROM SALES.EMPS
return !ID$0$SLACKER.isNull() && !ID$0$SLACKER.value;

TestCase.name: testNotNullIsTrue
TestCase.Resource: SELECT manager is true FROM SALES.EMPS
return ID$0$MANAGER;

TestCase.name: testNotNullIsFalse
TestCase.Resource: SELECT manager is false FROM SALES.EMPS
return !ID$0$MANAGER;

TestCase.name: testNullableIsNull
TestCase.Resource: SELECT age is null FROM SALES.EMPS
return ID$0$AGE.isNull();

TestCase.name: testNullableIsNotNull
TestCase.Resource: SELECT age is not null FROM SALES.EMPS
return !ID$0$AGE.isNull();

TestCase.name: testNotNullIsNull
TestCase.Resource: SELECT empno is null FROM SALES.EMPS
return false;

TestCase.name: testNotNullIsNotNull
TestCase.Resource: SELECT empno is not null FROM SALES.EMPS
return true;

TestCase.name: testUser
TestCase.Resource: SELECT user FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testCurrentUser
TestCase.Resource: SELECT current_user FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testSessionUser
TestCase.Resource: SELECT session_user FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testSystemUser
TestCase.Resource: SELECT system_user FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testCurrentDate
TestCase.Resource: SELECT current_date FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testCurrentTime
TestCase.Resource: SELECT current_time FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testCurrentTimestamp
TestCase.Resource: SELECT current_timestamp FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testCurrentPath
TestCase.Resource: SELECT current_path FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testJavaUdfInvocation
TestCase.Resource: SELECT sales.decrypt_public_key(public_key) FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testSqlUdfInvocation
TestCase.Resource: SELECT sales.maybe_female(gender) FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testCastToVarcharImplicitTruncate
TestCase.Resource: SELECT cast('supercalifragilistiexpialodocious' as varchar(10)) FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testCastToVarchar
TestCase.Resource: SELECT cast('boo' as varchar(10)) FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testCastToVarbinaryImplicitTruncate
TestCase.Resource: SELECT cast(x'00112233445566778899AABB' as varbinary(10)) FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testCastIntToVarchar
TestCase.Resource: SELECT cast(cast(null as tinyint) as varchar(30)) FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testCaseNotNullableCondWithElse
TestCase.Resource: SELECT case manager when true then 'Yes' when false then 'No' else 'Other' end FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testCaseNotNullableCondWithoutElse
TestCase.Resource: SELECT case deptno when 10 then 'Yes' end FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testCaseNullableCondWithElse
TestCase.Resource: SELECT case age when 50 then 'fifty' when 25 then 'twenty-five' end FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testCaseNullableCondWithoutElse
TestCase.Resource: SELECT case gender when 'M' then 'Yes' end FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testCaseNotNullableCondWithElsePrimitive
TestCase.Resource: SELECT case empno when 120 then 1 else 2 end FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testCaseNotNullableCondWithoutElsePrimitive
TestCase.Resource: SELECT case name when 'Fred' then 1 when 'Eric' then 2 when 'Wilma' then 3 when 'John' then 4 end FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testCaseNullableCondWithElsePrimitive
TestCase.Resource: SELECT case deptno when 10 then 1 when 20 then 2 when 40 then 3 else 4 end FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testCaseNullableCondWithoutElsePrimitive
TestCase.Resource: SELECT case slacker when true then 1 end FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testSubstringNullableLength
TestCase.Resource: SELECT substring(city, 2, age/10) FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testSubstringNullablePosition
TestCase.Resource: SELECT substring(city, age/20, empid) FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testSubstringNoLength
TestCase.Resource: SELECT substring(city, 3) FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testSubstringPositionLessThanZero
TestCase.Resource: SELECT substring(city, -1, 4) FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testSubstringPositionZero
TestCase.Resource: SELECT substring(city, 0, 4) FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testSubstringNegativeLength
TestCase.Resource: SELECT substring(city, 1, empid - 2) FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testSubstringNothingNullable
TestCase.Resource: SELECT substring(name, 2, empid) FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testConcatNoNullable
TestCase.Resource: SELECT name||name FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testConcatWithOneNullable
TestCase.Resource: SELECT city||name FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testConcatBothNullable
TestCase.Resource: SELECT city||city FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testOverlayNoLength
TestCase.Resource: SELECT overlay(city placing 'MIDDLE' from 2) FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testOverlayNullable
TestCase.Resource: SELECT overlay(city placing 'MIDDLE' from 2 for 3) FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testOverlayNoNullable
TestCase.Resource: SELECT overlay(name placing 'MIDDLE' from 2 for 3) FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testOverlayThreeNullable
TestCase.Resource: SELECT overlay(city placing name from age for age) FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testOverlayAllNullable
TestCase.Resource: SELECT overlay(city placing gender from age for age) FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testPower
TestCase.Resource: SELECT power(2, empid) FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testMod
TestCase.Resource: SELECT mod(age, 3) FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testTrimBoth
TestCase.Resource: SELECT trim(both 'S' from city) FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testTrimLeading
TestCase.Resource: SELECT trim(leading 'W' from name) FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testTrimTrailing
TestCase.Resource: SELECT trim(trailing 'c' from name) FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testUpper
TestCase.Resource: SELECT upper(city) FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testLower
TestCase.Resource: SELECT Lower(city) FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testInitcap
TestCase.Resource: SELECT initcap(city) FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testCharLength
TestCase.Resource: SELECT char_length(city) FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testCharacterLength
TestCase.Resource: SELECT character_length(city) FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testPosition
TestCase.Resource: SELECT position('Fran' in city) FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testLikeLiteral
TestCase.Resource: SELECT City like 'San%' FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testLikeRuntime
TestCase.Resource: SELECT City like Name FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testLikeLiteralWithEscape
TestCase.Resource: SELECT City like 'San%' escape 'n' FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testLikeRuntimeWithEscape
TestCase.Resource: SELECT City like Name escape 'n' FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testSimilarLiteral
TestCase.Resource: SELECT City similar to '[S][[:ALPHA:]]n%' FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testSimilarRuntime
TestCase.Resource: SELECT City similar to Name FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testSimilarLiteralWithEscape
TestCase.Resource: SELECT City similar to 'San%' escape 'n' FROM SALES.EMPS

TestCase.name: testSimilarRuntimeWithEscape
TestCase.Resource: SELECT City similar to Name escape 'n' FROM SALES.EMPS
